computer.description:
Nothing is known about the history of this computer which was probably sold only in Japan.
It was one of the rare professional computer to use the 16-bit Texas Instruments TMS-9900 microprocessor, also used in the TI-99/4 home computer.
A Basic interpreter and Assembler were available on diskette.
computer.keyboard: 101 keys with numeric & editing keypad and 9 function keys
computer.media: 1 or 2 PERTEC 5.25'' double sided, single density 133 KB FDD
computer.name: PHC 3000
computer.ports: Serial port. Optional 2nd Serial, Parallel, Printer
computer.ram: 32 KB up to 56 KB + optional 64 KB of data memory
